Question
========

In a clinical trial, men and women are randomly assigned to one of four treatments for anxiety symptoms. At the end of the treatment period, anxiety symptoms are measured by a questionnaire. What analysis technique should be used to investigate whether the four treatments are equally effective, and whether this differs for men and women? 
Answerlist
----------
* Multiple logistic regression
* ANCOVA
* Two-way ANOVA
* One-way ANOVA

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
